00025 template<class function>
00026         void C4DView::CustomFunctionSlot<function>::createCustomFunction(
00027                  C4DView *view) {
00028             function *tmp = new function (
00029                 view->Values->tmin (), view->Values->tmax (), view->Values->dt (),
00030                 view->Values->umin (), view->Values->umax (), view->Values->du (),
00031                 view->Values->vmin (), view->Values->vmax (), view->Values->dv ());
00032             if (tmp->isValid()) {
00033                     view->F.reset(tmp);
00034                     QString sym (((function *)(view->F).get ())->symbolic());
00035 
00036                 view->AssignValues(view->F);
00037                 view->Redraw ();
00038             } else {
00039                 delete tmp;
00040                 view->UpdateStatus("Failed to load custom function");
00041             }
00042         }
